mapper.insert:
select SENTENCE_ID_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into SENTENCE ( id, learning_id, sentence_question, sentence_answer, sentence_corrected ) values ( #{id}, #{learningId}, #{sentenceQuestion}, #{sentenceAnswer}, 'Not corrected yet' )
mapper.update: update SENTENCE set flashcard_id = #{sentenceUpdateDto.flashcardId}, sentence_corrected = #{sentenceUpdateDto.sentenceCorrected}, sentence_accuracy = #{sentenceUpdateDto.sentenceAccuracy}, sentence_next_repetition = #{sentenceUpdateDto.sentenceNextRepetition}, sentence_repetition_step = #{sentenceUpdateDto.sentenceRepetitionStep} where id = #{sentenceUpdateDto.sentenceId}
